column3:
Jim and Linda are our neighbors.  Jim and Linda have an old dog named Reggie.  We love our neighbors.  They are like the perfect grandparents.  
ewlineWe watch Reggie for them when they go out of town to see their children and grandchildren.  Reggie is so fun to have around.  He is 14 years old.  We have 3 other dogs and Reggie is older than all of them.  They all listen to what Reggie tells them to do.  It is fun to see them respect him.
ewline
ewlineWe are watching Reggie now.  He is staying with us for 3 weeks.  He likes to go for rides in the car.  He likes to go for walks.
ewline
ewlineThis time, when Jim and Linda dropped Reggie off, Jim picked up mom's guitar and played us a song.  He was really good!  Then Jim and Linda sang a song for us.
ewline
ewlineI can see why Reggie misses them when they are gone.  They are so nice!  We give Reggie lots of love so that he is happy at our house when they are on vacation.
ewline
ewlineHe likes our dogs and cats.  We have a big black dog named Able.  We have a little dog named Mudpuppy and we have a puppy named Goldberry.  We have two cats.  One of our cats is named Glitch.  She has lots of colors.  We also have a white kitten named Vex.
ewline
ewlineOne of the best things about watching Reggie is that we know when Jim and Linda come home, Linda bakes us a cherry pie for taking care of Reggie.  She makes delicious pie.
ewlineWe are very lucky to have such nice neighbors!
column4: one: Who are Jim and Linda?
column9: multiple: How many dogs and cats do we have?
column14: multiple: What did Jim and Linda do when they dropped Reggie off?
column15: Lina played piano and Jim sang.
column16: Linda danced and Jim told jokes.
column18: Jim played guitar and they both sang.
column19: one: What is the name of Jim and Linda's dog?
